CmdLine: apt-get update -qq &&     apt-get purge maven maven2 -y &&     apt-get install wget unzip gradle maven -y &&     mkdir -p ${ANDROID_HOME} &&     wget ${SDK_MANAGER_URL} -O android-sdk-tools.zip &&     unzip -q android-sdk-tools.zip -d ${ANDROID_HOME} &&     rm android-sdk-tools.zip &&     yes | sdkmanager --licenses &&     yes | sdkmanager "tools"     "platform-tools"     "platforms;android-26"     "build-tools;29.0.1"     "extras;android;gapid;1"     "extras;android;gapid;3"     "lldb;3.1"     "cmake;3.10.2.4988404"     "cmake;3.6.4111459"     "extras;google;market_apk_expansion"     "extras;google;instantapps"     "extras;google;market_licensing"     "extras;google;google_play_services"     "extras;google;webdriver"     "extras;android;m2repository"     "extras;google;m2repository"
Commands.Name: run
